metadata.name: Portrait of a vocation
metadata.description:
As the sea breeze hit the shore, carrying the hues of dusk, I felt my tiredness from hour-long travel taken away by the salty wind. It was in that serene moment I found this lady, standing next to her means of livelihood. That scene was  subtle yet sublime ! 
Marina beach of Tamil Nadu was exceptionally comforting as the day receded to night. 
 She was talking over her phone. Who could it have been, her husband, family, someone dependent on her? 

The burning fire, its flaring strands, I couldn’t help but compare it to her resilience in life. 
I wonder whether the dots of people around her noticed it too…

EDITION : 1/1
